state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First stop, make an attempt to go south. With that accomplished, make an effort to take a trip east. With that accomplished, venture north. Then, attempt to head west. After that, travel west. Then, go to the north. With that accomplished, make an effort to travel east. Then, head east. After that, attempt to head south. That done, make an attempt to venture east. That done, make an effort to venture east. Once you get through with that, head south. Then, travel south. Then, move south. With that accomplished, recover the coin from the floor of the basement. Alright, thanks! -= Recreation Zone =- You've just sauntered into a recreation zone.
